name: Inclusive Parents
author: Stephanie Leary

sections.description: Allow draft, private, scheduled, and password-protected pages to be selected as parents in page dropdowns. Private and password-protected pages may also be added to menus and the Pages widget.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Limit menu screen statuses to public, private, and password.
  • Use labels instead of names for (status) suffixes.
  • Add (status) suffix on menu screen.
  • Remove filter on public queries.

1.0.1

  • Prefix all the things

1.0

  • Initial release
